short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds timestamps to the GS chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Belated witty remarks happening too often? Wish Grooveshark had timestamps so you could stop replying to old messages? No more with Grooveshark Chat Timestamper!

First step towards making Grooveshark chat a better place to have a conversation. Feedback is appreciated.
